thread.title: Paul Ryan Sort Of Joins The House Speaker Race
thread.title_full: Paul Ryan Sort Of Joins The House Speaker Race : NPR

author: Ailsa Chang
title: Paul Ryan Sort Of Joins The House Speaker Race
text: After a week and a half of mounting pressure, Wisconsin Republican Paul Ryan announced he is open to serving as Speaker of the House after all â€” but with conditions: his fractured Republican caucus must unite behind him before he enters the race. Attention will now focus on a group of several dozen conservatives who will need to decide this week whether to back Ryan.
